data.actual_result: The buttons aren't aligned because their highlights aren't. Even if you look without the highlight, they don't look aligned.
data.short_description: When trying to call a person you share no servers with or trying to call a bot, in the modal, the "Okay" and "Send friend request" are not aligned.
data.steps_to_repro: - Try to call a bot. - Long press on the "Send Friend request" button and observe the highlight (if any). - Now, long press the "Okay" button and observe the highlight.
